typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_id as string,
		customer_unique_id as string,
		customer_zip_code_prefix as string,
		customer_city as string,
		customer_state as string,
		birth_date as string,
		gender as string,
		name as string,
		marital_status as string,
		income as string,
		employement_status as string,
		job_role as string,
		phone_no as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CustomerSource
CustomerSource derive(scd_is_current = "YES",
		scd_created_at = currentTimestamp()) ~> addingSCDIsCurrent
addingSCDIsCurrent sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		sk_customer as integer,
		customer_id as string,
		customer_unique_id as string,
		customer_zip_code_prefix as integer,
		customer_city as string,
		customer_state as string,
		birth_date as string,
		birth_year as integer,
		birth_month as integer,
		generation as string,
		age as integer,
		age_category as string,
		gender as string,
		name as string,
		marital_status as string,
		income as string,
		social_state as string,
		employement_status as string,
		job_role as string,
		phone_operator as string,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string,
		scd_soft_deleted as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		customer_id,
		customer_unique_id,
		customer_zip_code_prefix,
		customer_city,
		customer_state,
		birth_date,
		gender,
		name,
		marital_status,
		income,
		employement_status,
		job_role,
		scd_created_at,
		scd_is_current
	)) ~> sink1
